name: A Western Ballad
description:
CONTROLS: 
Start - Enter
Move - Directional Arrows
Interact - A, Z, Alt

A Western Ballad is an interactive story game made for Game Boy but playable in your browser or on your phone!

Fresh out of prison, you need to find where your wife has hidden the gold.

  • Explore a wild west environment
  • Classic Game Boy art
  • Unravel the story

Also playable on an emulator by downloading the ROM.

Music possibly coming soon, along with art asset-pack release.

Follow me on Twitter @robertldoman
